title: Add-ons shutdown influence
Correlations between shutdown time and add-ons
description: A linear regression model is fit using the add-ons as predictors for the logarithm of the shutdown time. The job is run weekly on all the data collected on Monday for the release channel on Windows.
field-description: The fraction of pings that contained the add-on
The add-on coefficient expresses the change in percentage wrt the average shutdown time with no add-ons
The standard error of the coefficient
The value of the associated t-statistic for the coefficient
